Text: Re Data AcquisitionFlender Gearbox Cc LNotesnsf Kurt Is this possible I believe that AEP specified only Eichoff gearboxes on this site Mike Kurt Anderson AM To Mark nron cc Bo nron Jeff NRON Mike NRON Danielle nron Subject Data AcquisitionFlender Gearbox Ben confirming our conversation earlier today regarding the two items below Mark Fisher a Data Analyst in our Information Services group is available on Friday March at PST to address your questions regarding the downloading of data from SCADA Mark and I will contact you in your office at CST Regarding the defective Eickoff gearbox on WTG at Trent Mesa today EWC will ship a replacement Flender gearbox to Trent Mesa from our Tehachapi location It is our plan to install this gearbox in place of the defective Eickoff gearbox and return the turbine to operational status as soon as possible Regards Kurt

Trent Scada Cc LNotesnsf The phone number for Trent dail up has changed The new number is The old number belong to AEP and is connected to the substation Please inform anyone not on this list that you think needs notified Mike
